t: Amazon.com : Golden Heavy Body Acrylic Introductory Set (0000074-0) : Art Paints : Arts, Crafts & Sewing
s: I know Golden has put out a few different sets for different aims: a landscape set, a traditional set, etc. I hoped this one would be well-rounded enough to give me a wide range. TLDR: Great paints. Good deal to try out artist acrylic. Not the greatest gamut by itself. ... This is great paint. Good little starter to determine how great the brand ...

t: Amazon.com: Heavy Body Acrylics by GOLDEN, Mixing Set, 12 Color, Professional Acrylic Paint : Arts, Crafts & Sewing
Amazon.com: Fluid Acrylics by GOLDEN, Iridescent Gold Deep (Fine), 1 fl. oz. Bottle, Professional Acrylic Paint, Semi-Opaque
s: I have several brands of liquid acrylic gold paint. They all are very transparent and take several coats to get good gold coverage. Not so with Golden’s Iridescent Gold Deep (Fine). It flows beautifully off your brush and just two coats is sufficient even painted over a dark base.
